languages.text: "Записано". {n}Начищенные до блеска окуляры Вультур вновь впериваются в вас.{/n} "Теперь, когда доклад по Тассере запротоколирован, я выражаю Вашей Светлости официальную благодарность от лица Адептус Администратум за оказанную поддержку — да будет славиться имя фон Валанциус, да хранит Император династию долгие лета. Далее я прошу помощи в еще одной ситуации: во Дворце Правосудия скопилось несколько важнейших дел, вынести решения по которым способен только Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: {n}Начищенные до блеска окуляры Вультур вновь впериваются в вас.{/n} "Несмотря на возможные негативные последствия ваших решений и сопутствующие им поступки проктора, Администратум выносит вам благодарность, Ваша Светлость. Не будете ли вы так любезны помочь нам еще в одной ситуации? Во Дворце Правосудия скопилось несколько щекотливых дел, вынести решения по которым способен только человек вашего статуса. Это традиция, восходящая к началу нашего союза с Теодорой фон Валанциус".

languages.text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."
languages.original_text: "Записано". {n}Начищенные до блеска окуляры Вультур вновь впериваются в вас.{/n} "Теперь, когда доклад по Тассере запротоколирован, я выражаю Вашей Светлости официальную благодарность от лица Адептус Администратум за оказанную поддержку — да будет славиться имя фон Валанциус, да хранит Император династию долгие лета. May the von Valancius name forever be praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require a formal resolution by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

languages.text: 「記録済み、登録完了」{n}総監の完璧に磨かれた眼鏡が再びあなたを見据えた。{/n}「これでタッセーラに関する調査報告書は正式に記録されました。ここに、帝国行政局を代表して、あなたが私たちに提供してくださった支援に対し、正式な感謝の意を表します。フォン・ヴァランシウスの名が永遠に讃えられ、あなたの王朝に皇帝のご加護が代々続かんことを。さて、本題に入らせていただきますが、現在、司法宮において極めて重要な裁判案件が多数積み重なっております。これらは、ローグトレーダーご自身による正式な裁定を要するものです」
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: 「記録済み、登録完了」{n}総監の完璧に磨かれた眼鏡が再びあなたを見据えた。{/n}「これでタッセーラに関する調査報告書は正式に記録されました。ここに、帝国行政局を代表して、あなたが私たちに提供してくださった支援に対し、正式な感謝の意を表します。フォン・ヴァランシウスの名が永遠に讃えられ、あなたの王朝に皇帝のご加護が代々続かんことを。さて、本題に入らせていただきますが、現在、司法宮において極めて重要な裁判案件が多数積み重なっております。これらは、ローグトレーダーご自身による正式な裁定を要するものです」

languages.text: "Notiert und aufgezeichnet." {n}Die makellos polierten Okularlinsen der Präfektin scheinen dich erneut zu durchbohren.{/n} "Nun, da der Inspektionsbericht über Thassera ordnungsgemäß archiviert wurde, möchte ich im Namen des Adeptus Administratum offiziell unseren Dank für Eure Unterstützung zum Ausdruck bringen. Möge der Name von Valancius auf ewig gepriesen werden, und möge der Imperator Eure Dynastie viele Generationen lang beschützen. Jetzt muss ich Euch allerdings in einer anderen Sache um Hilfe bitten. Im Justizpalast haben sich einige wichtige Fälle angehäuft ... Fälle, die einer formellen Resolution {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} selbst bedürfen."
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: "Notiert und aufgezeichnet." {n}Die makellos polierten Okularlinsen der Präfektin scheinen dich erneut zu durchbohren.{/n} "Nun, da der Inspektionsbericht über Thassera ordnungsgemäß archiviert wurde, möchte ich im Namen des Adeptus Administratum offiziell unseren Dank für Eure Unterstützung zum Ausdruck bringen. Möge der Name von Valancius auf ewig gepriesen werden, und möge der Imperator Eure Dynastie viele Generationen lang beschützen. Jetzt muss ich Euch allerdings in einer anderen Sache um Hilfe bitten. Im Justizpalast haben sich einige wichtige Fälle angehäuft ... Fälle, die einer formellen Resolution {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} selbst bedürfen."

languages.text: « J'en prends bonne note. {n}Les lorgnons mécaniques immaculés de la préfète se tournent de nouveau vers vous.{/n} Maintenant que le rapport d'inspection de Thassera a été correctement consigné, permettez-moi, au nom de l'Adeptus Administratum, de vous remercier pour le soutien que vous nous avez apporté. Que le nom von Valancius soit à jamais loué, et puisse l'Empereur protéger les nombreuses générations à naître au sein de votre dynastie. Je dois cependant solliciter votre aide d'une autre manière. Un certain nombre de dossiers sensibles se sont accumulés dernièrement au palais de justice... des affaires qui appellent une résolution formelle par {mf|le libre-marchand lui-même|la libre-marchande elle-même}. »
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: « J'en prends bonne note. {n}Les lorgnons mécaniques immaculés de la préfète se tournent de nouveau vers vous.{/n} Maintenant que le rapport d'inspection de Thassera a été correctement consigné, permettez-moi, au nom de l'Adeptus Administratum, de vous remercier pour le soutien que vous nous avez apporté. Que le nom von Valancius soit à jamais loué, et puisse l'Empereur protéger les nombreuses générations à naître au sein de votre dynastie. Je dois cependant solliciter votre aide d'une autre manière. Un certain nombre de dossiers sensibles se sont accumulés dernièrement au palais de justice... des affaires qui appellent une résolution formelle par {mf|le libre-marchand lui-même|la libre-marchande elle-même}. »

languages.text: «Que conste en acta». {n}Las pulidas lentes de la prefecta vuelven a dirigirse hacia ti.{/n} «Ahora que el informe de la inspección de Thassera ha sido añadido debidamente al registro, permítame manifestarle la gratitud del Adeptus Administratum por el apoyo prestado. Que el nombre de von Valancius sea eternamente alabado y que el Emperador proteja su dinastía durante generaciones. Dicho esto, me veo obligada a pedir su ayuda en otro asunto: se nos han acumulado diversos casos importantes en el Palacio de la Justicia. La clase de casos que requieren una resolución formal por su parte como Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: «Que conste en acta». {n}Las pulidas lentes de la prefecta vuelven a dirigirse hacia ti.{/n} «Ahora que el informe de la inspección de Thassera ha sido añadido debidamente al registro, permítame manifestarle la gratitud del Adeptus Administratum por el apoyo prestado. Que el nombre de von Valancius sea eternamente alabado y que el Emperador proteja su dinastía durante generaciones. Dicho esto, me veo obligada a pedir su ayuda en otro asunto: se nos han acumulado diversos casos importantes en el Palacio de la Justicia. La clase de casos que requieren una resolución formal por su parte como Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: “上述内容已记录在案。”{n}行政官的目光透过精心打磨过的镜片，再次刺入你的灵魂。{/n}“塔瑟拉的视察报告已正式纳入记录之中。在此，请允许我代表帝国内政部，对您向我们提供的帮助正式表达谢意。愿冯·瓦兰修斯之名永远光辉灿烂，愿帝皇世世代代庇佑您的王朝。不过，话说回来，我恐怕不得不再次请求您协助我们解决另一个问题——正义大殿里积累了许多非常重要的案件，这些案件需要行商浪人本人亲自审查。”
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

traits.locale_text: “上述内容已记录在案。”{n}行政官的目光透过精心打磨过的镜片，再次刺入你的灵魂。{/n}“塔瑟拉的视察报告已正式纳入记录之中。在此，请允许我代表帝国内政部，对您向我们提供的帮助正式表达谢意。愿冯·瓦兰修斯之名永远光辉灿烂，愿帝皇世世代代庇佑您的王朝。不过，话说回来，我恐怕不得不再次请求您协助我们解决另一个问题——正义大殿里积累了许多非常重要的案件，这些案件需要行商浪人本人亲自审查。”

languages.text: "Bu durum kayıtlara geçirildi." {n}Prefektin kusursuzca parlatılmış oküler mercekleri, bir kez daha sana kilitleniyor.{/n} "Thassera denetim raporu düzgün bir şekilde kayıtlara geçirildiğine göre... Bize sağladığınız destek için Adeptus Administratum adına teşekkürlerimi sunmama müsaade edin. Von Valancius adı sonsuza dek övgüyle zikredilsin ve İmparator, hanedanlığınızı gelecek nesillerde de gözetsin. Şimdi sizden farklı bir konuda yardım rica edeceğim. Adalet Sarayı'nda, Hür Tacir gibi birinin resmî hükmüne muhtaç davalar birikmiş bulunuyor."
languages.original_text: "Noted and recorded." {n}The prefect's immaculately polished ocular lenses bore into you once more.{/n} "Now that the Thassera inspection report has been properly entered into the record, allow me, on behalf of the Adeptus Administratum, to officially extend our gratitude to you for the support you provided to us. May the von Valancius name be forever praised, and may the Emperor protect your dynasty for many generations to come. That said, I must now request your assistance in a different capacity: a number of highly important court cases have accumulated at the Palace of Justice — the kind that require formal resolutions by the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself}."

Bize sağladığınız destek için Adeptus Administratum adına teşekkürlerimi sunmama müsaade edin. Von Valancius adı sonsuza dek övgüyle zikredilsin ve İmparator, hanedanlığınızı gelecek nesillerde de gözetsin. Şimdi sizden farklı bir konuda yardım rica edeceğim. Adalet Sarayı'nda, Hür Tacir gibi birinin resmî hükmüne muhtaç davalar birikmiş bulunuyor."
